name: SmartMonitor
0:
”Alexa, ask Certas Energy how much fuel do I have in my tank?”
”Alexa, ask Certas Energy when will I run out of heating oil?”
”Alexa, ask Certas Energy to call me back.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: certas energy
Developer Terms of Use
des: With Alexa, you can now use voice control for your Smart Monitor on your fuel tank. Monitoring your fuel levels just got easier and more intuitive giving you peace of mind that you’ll never run out of heating oil again.
